I don't know what's going on in the past year or so, perhaps a reaction to the riots this summer and all the shit going on in recent months. But look at Joe Biden 40 years ago and all the "old Democrats" who were leftists with right-wing cultural beliefs and most of you sound exactly like them now.

What's happened is you abandoned freedom. What happened to small government, individual liberty, free markets, free speech, and the constitution? It seems you've become obsessed and fixated with nothing but beating the other side lately, and have been resorting to authoritarian means to do so. Are you even conservatives anymore? I wouldn't say so, because this new philosophy doesn't at all align with founding values.

Lately I've seen a lot of comments saying certain people should be banned from being able to hold office, serve in the military, or even be censored ([this thread ](https://ruqqus.com/+Conservative/post/6ube/joe-biden-taps-transgender-official-as) alone has many examples). Support for limited government, individual rights, equality under the law, and free markets is waning. None of this was happening until about a year ago. Up until then, conservatives could be defined as rooted in the moderately libertarian founding values of the USA, with some republic thrown in as necessary. That's definitely not true anymore. Many conservatives had strong beliefs but it was vital that they not be forced on others like the Democrats do, especially by the government. But now many of you want just that. If I had seen conservatives just 5 years ago I wouldn't even recognize you now. What the fuck happened? Are you trying to actually become what the media has been slandering you as for all these years?
